Text.Page:
Like any great sorcerer, Oshar tends to inspire all sorts of folklore. But only a few know what I know: "he" is actually a "she!"

Even some of Oshar's most trusted confidants don't know the truth."Why does it matter?"

I do not question the motives of the great and powerful Oshar!

I do, however, try to give her gifts that remind her that I know her true nature. I'm making a feathered headdress, and...

You guessed it. I need help gathering the feathers. You're starting to anticipate the needs of mighty Oshar! In time, you too could bask in her wisdom.
This feathered headdress will please Oshar immensely. And it's better to have Oshar as a friend than as an enemy.
